p: The study was approved by the Rwanda National Ethics Committee (Protocol No. 172/RNEC/2017; Kigali, Rwanda), National Health Research Committee (Kigali, Rwanda), Inshuti Mu Buzima Research Committee (Rwinkwavu, Rwanda), Partners Human Research Committee (Boston, MA), and Stanford Institutional Review Board (Stanford, CA). All participants provided written informed consent, and the study protocol conforms to the ethical guidelines of the 1975 Declaration of Helsinki.
